column3: FAO 1.A.X.b Burning of crop residues + FAO 6.C Fires in organic soils to IPCC 3.C.1.b Biomass Burning In Croplands
Indirect N2O Emissions from Manure Management

1.A.X.a.i crop residues direct emissions + 3.X.1.b manure management (Direct emissions N2O) + 3.X.2.a manure left on pasture  + 3.X.3.a manure applied (direct emissions N2O) = 3.C.4 Direct N2O Emissions from Managed Soils

1.A.X.a.ii crop residues indirect emissions + 3.X.2.b manure left on pasture (indirect emissions N2O) + 3.X.3.b manure applied (indirect emissions N2O) = 3.C.5 Indirect N2O Emissions from Managed Soils
